functionality_test.notes: Core game loop and rendering logic executed properly. The game has a well-structured menu system, game state transitions, and physics-based platformer mechanics including gravity, horizontal acceleration/deceleration, and platform collision detection. Enemy spawning system with decreasing spawn rate was implemented. Score calculation based on enemy stomps (100 points) and survival time (10 points per second) was functional.

technical_verification.notes: All technical specifications from appinfo.json match the implementation.

summary.text: The Vector Super Mario Bros Jump and Squash game successfully starts and runs without errors. The Pygame-based application demonstrates stable runtime behavior with proper game loop execution, physics simulation, and rendering. All core game mechanics are implemented and functional including player movement with platformer-style physics, enemy spawning and AI movement toward player, collision detection for stomping mechanics, score tracking, and game state management. The application can be started using 'uv run main.py' and terminated with ESC key or closing the window.
